sense.gloss: to give up, to abandon (hope, plans), to resign oneself (to)
resignation, acceptance, consolation
satya, truth
important point
conventional truth
clear insight
resignation (to one's fate), acceptance
ultimate truth
essence
understanding and acceptance, spiritual awakening, a heart that understands truth, (feeling of) resignation
The Four Noble Truths
to resign oneself (to), to reconcile oneself (to), to accept (e.g. defeat), to give up
to resign oneself (to), to reconcile oneself (to), to accept (e.g. defeat), to give up
threefold truth (all things are void; all things are temporary; all things are in the middle state between these two) (in Tendai)
truth of temporariness (holding that all things are temporary)
truth of emptiness (holding that all things are void)
truth of the middle (all things are in a middle state, being void yet having temporary existence)
truth of suffering
truth of the cessation of suffering
truth of the way to the cessation of suffering
amazing truth, cardinal principle, key (to understanding)
The Four Noble Truths
truth of the origin of suffering
knowing when to give up, good at letting things go, accepting failure with good grace, being a good loser
not knowing when to give up, being a bad loser, poor at letting things go, unable to accept the inevitable
not knowing when to give up, being a bad loser, poor at letting things go, unable to accept the inevitable
knowing when to give up, good at letting things go, accepting failure with good grace, being a good loser
point where one has to accept one's fate, point where one has to give up, state of resignation, resigned state

sdata.j: すぐに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めて↑昼寝↑↓ひるね↓をするかも↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑死↑↓し↓んだものと↑諦↑↓あきら↓めてはいけない。
sdata.e: You should not give him up for lost.

sdata.j: ↑希望↑↓きぼう↓がなくなったから↑諦↑↓あきら↓めたのではなかった。
sdata.e: I didn't give up for lack of hope.

sdata.j: ↑何事↑↓なにごと↓も↑諦↑↓あきら↓めが↑肝心↑↓かんじん↓だ。
sdata.e: Resignation is the first lesson of life.

sdata.j: ↑何事↑↓なにごと↓にも↑諦↑↓あきら↓めがたいせつ。
sdata.e: Resignation is the first lesson of life.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓で↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓を↑諦↑↓あきら↓めた。
sdata.e: The rain discouraged us from going out.

sdata.j: じゃ、↑諦↑↓あきら↓めるんだね？
sdata.e: So you give up, right?

sdata.j: しかたがないと↑諦↑↓あきら↓める。
sdata.e: Abide by the inevitable.

sdata.j: サムに↑計画↑↓けいかく↓を↑諦↑↓あきら↓めるように↑説得↑↓せっとく↓したが↑上手↑↓うま↓く↑行↑↓い↓かなかった。
sdata.e: I tried to persuade Sam to give up his plan, only to fail.

sdata.j: あなたの↑激励↑↓げきれい↓がなかったら、この↑計画↑↓けいかく↓は↑諦↑↓あきら↓めていたでしょうね。
sdata.e: Without your encouragement, I should have given up the plan.

sdata.j: ↑才能↑↓さいのう↓がなくても↑諦↑↓あきら↓めてはいけない。
sdata.e: You shouldn't give up just because you have no talent.

sdata.j: ↑才能↑↓さいのう↓がないからといって↑諦↑↓あきら↓めるべきじゃない。
sdata.e: You shouldn't give up just because you have no talent.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑大統領↑↓だいとうりょう↓に↑立候補↑↓りっこうほ↓するのを↑諦↑↓あきら↓めた。
sdata.e: I gave up running for president.

sdata.j: ↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓しても↑諦↑↓あきら↓めるな。
sdata.e: Don't give up if you fail.

sdata.j: ↑実際↑↓じっさい↓、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑誰↑↓だれ↓かと↑付↑↓つ↓き↑合↑↓あ↓っているけれども、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓を↑諦↑↓あきら↓めない。
sdata.e: Even though she is seeing someone else, I won't give her up.

sdata.j: ↑諦↑↓あきら↓めてしまえ。
sdata.e: Give it up.

sdata.j: ↑諦↑↓あきら↓めろ。
sdata.e: Give it up.

sdata.j: ↑諦↑↓あきら↓めないで。
sdata.e: Don't give up!

sdata.j: ↑諦↑↓あきら↓めちゃ↑駄目↑↓だめ↓だ。
sdata.e: Don't give up!

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑死↑↓し↓んだものとして↑諦↑↓あきら↓めた↑事↑↓こと↓は↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓である。
sdata.e: It is a great pity he was given up for lost.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はきっぱりと↑企↑↓くわだ↓てを↑諦↑↓あきら↓めた。
sdata.e: He gave up his attempt once and for all.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はめったに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めぬ。
sdata.e: He rarely gives up.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑第↑↓だい↓３コーナーを↑回↑↓まわ↓ったところでレースを↑諦↑↓あきら↓めた。
sdata.e: He threw away the race after rounding the third turn.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑諦↑↓あきら↓めが↑早↑↓はや↓い。
sdata.e: He is a good loser.

sdata.j: ↑他↑↓た↓の↑女↑↓おんな↓にとられるよりは、↑諦↑↓あきら↓めつくもん！
sdata.e: I'd just be able to give up better than if you were taken by some other woman.

sdata.j: たいていの↑人間↑↓にんげん↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑能力↑↓のうりょく↓に↑気↑↓き↓づく↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑物事↑↓ものごと↓を↑諦↑↓あきら↓めてしまうようだ。
sdata.e: It looks like most people give up before realizing their abilities.

sdata.j: ↑他↑↓た↓の↑女↑↓おんな↓にとられるよりは、↑諦↑↓あきら↓めつくもん！
sdata.e: I'd rather give up than have you taken by another woman.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑海外↑↓かいがい↓に↑行↑↓い↓くという↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑完全↑↓かんぜん↓に↑諦↑↓あきら↓めることはできなかった。
sdata.e: She was unable to completely give up her dream of traveling abroad.

sdata.j: すぐに↑諦↑↓あきら↓めて↑昼寝↑↓ひるね↓をするかも↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: I may give up soon and just take a nap.

sdata.j: トムに↑諦↑↓あきら↓める↑気↑↓き↓はなかった。
sdata.e: Tom had no intention of giving up.
